title: 1win KR bookmaker Review : profile creation , verification , mobile application , line , painting , odds and available bonuses
body_text:
1win KR: overview of registration, mobile application, line, painting, odds and bonuses
1win betting company has been in existence since 2016 (until 2018 it was called FirstBet). BC accepts bets through the official website and mobile applications with the permission of the Government of Curacao. In addition to betting, 1IN players are offered slots, live casino, roulette, and dozens of other gambling games. Strengths of the 1win bookmaker:
- Excellent painting on all popular sports;
- A large welcome bonus for the casino;
- Simple registration procedure.
Profile creation, verification, and requirements for beginners
On the official website of 1win KR, the registration procedure is extremely simple:
- First, you need to go to the official website.
- Next, find the “Register” button and click on it.
- After that, specify the email, come up with a password, and agree with the rules.
- After registration, log in to the 1win personal account (icon with a dummy), select the “Settings” section, and specify the full name and date of birth.
That’s it, you can place bets on 1IN and use other BC functions. At the first withdrawal of funds, verification of the profile will begin — you will be asked for a photo of the following documents:
- Passport: main page spread, pages with “registration” (registration);
- Bank statement or other documents confirming the place of residence;
- The front side of the bank card or a screenshot of the personal account of the electronic system.
1win Mobile App
Mobile software from 1win KR completely repeats the site in functionality, users can access
Sports betting, watching video broadcasts from the phone;
- Registration, verification, and activation of bonuses;
- Investments under the 1win invest program;
- Online casino games in demo mode and for real money;
- Replenishment and withdrawal of funds to bank cards and electronic wallets.
How do I download the 1win KR app to my phone? For Android and iOS owners, the system is the same: there are no download links in the Google Play and App Store, they are only on the official website of the 1win office. To download 1win for Android:
- You need to go to the mobile version of the site 1win from the smartphone browser.
- In the basement of the site, select the Android icon and download the APK file.
- Find the downloaded file in the downloads, click, and start the installation.
- Click the “Install” button.
- Open the 1win app online on your phone.
How to download 1win KR on iOS?
Exactly the same scheme as with the software on Android. It is important that all applications of 1win casino work 24/7. Customers can play slots, write to support, watch live matches, and become a member of a live casino with live dealers. For all new players, the office offers
1win bonus for installing the application will be credited to the client’s account immediately after downloading the mobile software and authorization.
Line and painting
The bookmaker’s line features events from more than 30 different sports. Among the available sports are both popular (football, basketball, tennis, boxing) and quite exotic (floorball, darts, water polo and others). In addition to traditional sports, esports is also available. The line features the most popular esports disciplines: League of Legends, Dota 2, CS Go, and some others.
The painting is often very wide, especially for popular events in popular sports (Champions League, TOP 5 European football championships, NBA games, and others). Such events can include 500 or even more markets.
The bookmaker allows you to place bets on the main popular types, including ordinary, express, handicap, total, system, and bets on statistics.
Live
The live section is also pleasantly pleasing, here you can find lines for almost all sports represented in the BC. Every day the bookmaker provides access to 700-800 live events. On weekends, this number increases approximately twice.
To go to the live section, you should click on the corresponding item in the navigation menu on the main page or any other page of the 1win bookmaker. After that, the user will be shown all the current events for live bets.
Coefficients
For many popular events, the odds of this bookmaker are above average. This can especially be said about events that arouse great interest among sports fans, since for them the margin level can be 3-4%. As for the average margin size for sports, it is approximately as follows:
- Hockey. Popular games within the NHL and KHL have a margin of 4-7%, the remaining 8-10%.
- Basketball. Popular NBA games 5-6%, other basketball competitions 7-10%.
- Tennis. Grand Slam and other popular tournaments 6-7%, the rest 8-10%.
A sufficiently high level of coefficients is a significant reason for the popularity of this bookmaker.
Football line on the official website of 1win KR
Event coverage is average. In BC, you can bet on all the key championships, most European countries are represented up to the second and third divisions, and there are also youth and even women’s cups. But there is no obvious exoticism (like the 3rd or 4th League of Georgia).
The painting of the 1win website strongly depends on the rank of the tournament. Thousands of betting options are put up for TOP-league matches (Serie A, Premier League, others). In addition to outcomes, totals and odds, statistics, goal markets, and forecasts for events in the match, combined bets are available there…
On the minor matches of the 1st, they also put up a decent painting. Even local games contain from several dozen to several hundred bets.
Bonuses
Bookmaker users can count on the following bonus incentives:
- First deposit bonus. After making the first deposit to the account, the bettor can receive a reward in the amount of 200% of the deposit amount. At the same time, the maximum amount of encouragement is limited to 300 dollars. Initially, the funds are credited to the bonus account, to transfer them to the main account, the money will need to be wagered.
- Bonuses for express. If the user adds more than 5 events to the express bet, then in case of a win, he can count on an increase in the coefficient.
Also, the bookmaker periodically conducts all kinds of promotions timed to major sporting events (the World Cup, the Olympic Games, and others).
